dr.evolution.tree
Class SimpleTree

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.tree.SimpleTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
MutableTree, Tree, MutableTaxonList, TaxonList, Units, Attributable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClusteringTree, LeastSquaresClockTree, RateSmoothingTree
public class SimpleTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements MutableTree

A data structure for binary rooted trees.

Version:
$Id: SimpleTree.java,v 1.65 2006/08/23 10:46:33 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond

Serialized Form

adoptNodes

protected void adoptNodes(SimpleNode node)
Adopt a node hierarchy as its own. Only called by the SimpleTree(SimpleNode, TaxonList). This creates the node list and stores the nodes in post-traversal order.
